entry.title: New release for Eigenfocus: Eigenfocus V1.0 - Manage your projects, time and focus on the present without losing the long term vision
entry.content:
We're proud to announce Version 1 of Eigenfocus. This release completes the trinity of Eigenfocus's pillars: focus.

Focus is not about productivity: it's about finding flow, achieving goals and, ultimately, experiencing fulfillment and happiness.

Here are the highlights for this update:

Focus Space

A distraction-free environment to stay focused with:

  • Immersive Ambient Sounds ‚Äì Customize your workspace with relaxing sounds.
  • Timers / Alarms ‚Äì Structure your work sessions with built-in timers. Use it for Pomodoro sessions, breaks, remember to drink water or stretch (he have cool alarms sounds too).

Improvements on project and issues management

  • Project and issue archive and removal ‚Äì Keep your workspace clean and organized.
  • Project Templates ‚Äì Get started faster with our collection of project templates.
  • New Markdown Editor ‚Äì Easier to write your texts and allows us to implement more advanced features in the future.
  • Time Entry CSV Export ‚Äì Easily track and share your work hours.

More details and screenshots on the Eigenfocus Blog.

Thank you

This release lays the foundation for our vision of a flexible tool that fits your needs and helps you to complete your projects in a healthy and sustainable way.

Thank you all for your support and feedbacks. üòéüëç

Next steps

A lot of work have been done and a lot of new features will come in the future for both of our editions Free and PRO.

Speaking about our PRO Edition: the cloud version and self hosted version will be released in the next weeks! With multiple visualizations, grid view, issue types, multiple users and permissions and more.

So, if you have more complex needs, bigger projects or teams, check out our PRO Edition!

Click here to know more and subscribe to the waitlist

Migration steps

Only for 0.7.0 or older

If you're coming from a version older than 0.7.0 you first need run our latest 0.9.0 in order to migrate some database files and then upgrade to 1.0.0.

entry.title: New release for Eigenfocus: Mark Issues as Finished, Copy Global Links and More Improvements
entry.content:
Hi there. üëã

Eigenfocus has evolved a lot in the last weeks and here is the summary of the main changes in our FREE Edition for you to explore!

Finishing an issue - Mark an issue as finished by checking in a board card or on the issue detail - See when an issue was finished inside the issue detail - Filter issues by finished state using the list view

Global issue URL - Added a "Global ID" button at the top of the issue detail. You can click on it to copy the issue link - Use this link to share with someone or to reference it in another issue description

Temporarily storing issue description Have you ever started writing something and just closed the issue without saving it? Well... now your draft is preserved.

We're temporarily storing the changes in your browser and showing a warning when you have unsaved changes.

If you‚Äôve been enjoying Eigenfocus, don't forget to recommend it to your friends :)

Thanks üôè.
